frameworkAgreement.title: Framework agreement
frameworkAgreement.description: The details of the framework agreement

maximumNumberSelectedTenderers.title: Maximum number of selected tenderers
maximumNumberSelectedTenderers.description: The maximum number of tenderers that may be awarded a contract in the framework agreement. Set to 0 for an unlimited number of tenderers.

competitionReopening.title: Reopening of the competition in the framework agreement
competitionReopening.description: Whether or not the competition is reopened for each subsequent contract of the framework agreement.

durationRationale.title: Framework agreement duration rationale
durationRationale.description: The justification for exceptional cases when the duration of framework agreements exceeds the legal limits.

buyerCategories.title: Framework agreement buyer categories
buyerCategories.description: Any additional categories of buyers participating in the framework agreement and not mentioned by name (e.g. 'all hospitals in the Tuscany region').

dynamicPurchasingSystem.title: Dynamic purchasing system
dynamicPurchasingSystem.description: Whether a dynamic purchasing system is involved and, in case of central purchasing bodies, whether it can be used by buyers not listed in this procedure.

electronicAuction.title: Electronic auction
electronicAuction.description: Whether or not an electronic auction is used.

electronicAuctionURL.title: Electronic auction URL
electronicAuctionURL.description: The internet address of the electronic auction.

electronicAuctionDescription.title: Electronic auction description
electronicAuctionDescription.description: Any additional information about the electronic auction.

electronicCatalogue.title: Electronic catalogue required
electronicCatalogue.description: Whether tenderers are required, allowed or not allowed to submit (parts of) bids as electronic catalogues.
